trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent"></xref> event that is raised by visual design tools, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], implementing the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: A kezelő mód a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent"> </xref> , mint a vizuális tervező eszközök által kiváltott eseményt [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]végrehajtási, a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView"> </xref> felületet.

trans-unit.source: When you create a ViewEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Egy ViewEventHandler delegált létrehozásakor meg kell adnia a módszert, amelyet az esemény fogja kezelni.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Az esemény társítja a eseménykezelő, vegye fel a küldött példányának az esemény.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Az eseménykezelő nevezzük az esemény akkor következik be, amikor, ha nem távolítja el a delegált.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Eseménykezelő meghatalmazottak kapcsolatos további információkért lásd: [NIB: események és -Delegáltaknak](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is raised by the designer host for certain actions on a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>egy esemény jelenik meg a Tervező állomás a(z) a tervezési felülethez vezérlő bizonyos műveletei.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is handled by a ViewEventHandler delegate method, which takes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>eseményt kezeli a ViewEventHandler delegált metódust, amely fogad egy <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>objektum paraméterként.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: Typically, control designer classes do not directly implement or assign a ViewEventHandler delegate.
trans-unit.target: Vezérlő Tervező osztályok általában közvetlenül nem valósítja meg vagy egy ViewEventHandler delegált hozzárendelése.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> base class supplies a default delegate for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>alaposztály megadja az alapértelmezett meghatalmazott a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>esemény.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Custom control designers override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> methods to process those events for the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Egyéni vezérlő tervezők bírálja felül a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, és <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A>módszerek feldolgozni ezeket az eseményeket a vezérlő a Tervező felületére.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> method sets the default event delegate for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> delegate.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>metódus állítja be az alapértelmezett delegálási a a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>delegálása.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>
